org.weso.wesearch

Interface Wesearch

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JenaWesearch

    public interface Wesearch
    This is the main interface of wesearch that defines the operations to implements.
    Author:
    Ignacio Fuertes Bernardo

    • Method Detail

      • getMatters

        Matters getMatters(java.lang.String stem)
                   throws WesearchException
        Return a collection of subjects for a given string
        Parameters:
        stem - Given string to obtain a collection of subjects
        Returns:
        A collection of subjects
        Throws:
        WesearchException - This exception is thrown if there are some problem during the task

      • getProperties

        Properties getProperties(Matter s,
                       java.lang.String stem)
                         throws WesearchException
        Returns a collection of properties for a given subject and string
        Parameters:
        s - Given subject to obtains it's properties
        stem - Given string to search properties
        Returns:
        A collection of properties according with the matter received as a parameter
        Throws:
        WesearchException - This exception is thrown if there are some problem during the task

      • getValueSelector

        ValueSelector getValueSelector(Matter s,
                             Property p)
                               throws WesearchException
        Returns the value selector for a given subject and property
        Parameters:
        s - Given subject
        p - Given property to obtain it's value selector
        Returns:
        The value selector of the property
        Throws:
        WesearchException - This exception is thrown if there are some problem during the task

      • createQuery

        Query createQuery(Matter s,
                Property p,
                ValueSelector v)
                  throws WesearchException
        Returns a query for a given subject, property and value selector
        Parameters:
        s - Given subject to form the query
        p - Given property to form the query
        v - Given value selector to form the query
        Returns:
        A query built from given subject, property and value selector
        Throws:
        WesearchException - This exception is thrown if there are some problem during the task

      • combineQuery

        Query combineQuery(Query q,
                 Matter s,
                 Property p,
                 ValueSelector v)
                   throws WesearchException
        Given a query, returns a new query for a given subject, property and value
        Parameters:
        q - Given query to add new predicates
        s - Given subject to add to the query
        p - Given property to add to the query
        v - Given value selector to add to the query
        Returns:
        The new query
        Throws:
        WesearchException - This exception is thrown if there are some problem during the task

        Returns the version of the weserach
        Returns:
        The number of the version
